# Basic Cache Example

Shows storing and retrieving values using the in-memory cache provider.

## Run

```bash
go run .
```

Expected output:

```
foo=bar
```

## Next Steps

- Try the [Redis cache example](../redis-cache)
- Read the [cache package documentation](../../../pkg/cache)
